title: Chapter 1437 - Past Glories Erased By The Fierce Winds And Pelting Rain
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1437 - Past Glories Erased By The Fierce Winds And Pelting Rain

Heaven and earth were overcast. Everything was desolate and bleak.

The deeper they went into the Starjade Forbidden Grounds, the more perilous and terrifying it was. Strange, natural calamities lurked on every corner.

Furthermore, the power of the blood-red lightning blanketing the skies gradually grew all the more imposing. 

It was manifested of power left behind during the End of the Dharma, and it was full of a calamitous, destructive aura.

Even the Void Realm True Immortals dared not touch it lightly.

Crunch!

A massive, branched bolt of blood-red lightning fell, filling the skies with stingingly powerful light and tearing open numerous long, narrow rifts. 

Su Yi took out the Divine Replenishment Furnace and met it head-on. Purple immortal light swept outward, gathering all of the blood-red lightning filling the skies.

The Divine Replenishment Furnace trembled violently, as if wailing in grief. It would have been obvious to anyone that as mystical as this treasure was, it had absorbed more lightning than it could take. It wouldn’t hold out much longer.
